Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.Messages

Class Message

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Messages.Message
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AcceptedLoginMessage, AlmostOverMessage, BadMoveMessage, ChatMessage, CommonGoalMessage, ErrorMessage, GameMessage, GoodMoveMessage, GridMessage, InvalidUsernameMessage, LibraryMessage, LobbyUpdateMessage, LoginMessage, MoveMessage, NewGameServerMessage, PlayerNumberAnswer, PlayerNumberRequest, ReturnToGameMessage, RMILoginMessage, ScoreMessage, ServerPingMessage, SetupMessage, SocketLoginMessage, WinnerMessage
public abstract class Message extends Object implements Serializable
The abstract representation of a generic network message. A generic message has a sender and an enum called type.
